name: pelargonium
content:
Add to word list

a plant with red, pink, or white flowers, often grown in containers and gardens: Using different shades of a single plant type such as pelargoniums is particularly effective in a small garden. Generations of gardeners have taken early cuttings from their favourite pelargoniums. Synonym
geranium
More examplesFewer examplesI water the pelargoniums half as much as I do my other pot plants.The conditions this year have been perfect for the pelargoniums.Pot on cuttings of pelargoniums, fuchsias, and other plants started in spring. Plants grown outside in the summer, pelargoniums for example, can be brought inside and will often continue to flower through the winter if they are given enough light.
